CompoundStabilizer¶

class components.liftingsurfaces.compoundstab.CompoundStabilizer(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

This class will instantiate the horizontal tail with the required area form the scissor plot. Also it will instantiate the vertical tails and position them relative to one another in a ‘boom tail’ conifguration. It also places a connector at the VT and HT intersection for the fuselage booms.

Returns:

ParaPy Geometry of the VT
Parameters:
  • required_planform_area (float) – This is the required horizontal tail area of the main wings from the stability analysis.
  • wing_planform_area (float) – This is the wing planfrom area in [m^2]
  • wing_mac_length (float) – This is the MAC length of the wing in SI meters
  • wing_semi_span (float) – This is the semispan of the wing in SI meters
  • lhc (float) – This is non-dimensionalized horizontal tail arm for the conventional plane.
  • configuration (float) – This is a switch to determine the configuration.
  • aspect_ratio (float) – This is the assumed Aspect Ratio of the HT Surface. The VT surface is a fixed AR of 1.4
  • taper (float) – This is the required Taper Ratio of the VT Surface.
  • twist (float) – This is the required Twist Angle of the Tip Airfoil w.r.t the Root Airfoil in degrees.
  • color (tuple) – Changes the color of the wing skin to the one defined in MyColors
aspect_ratio¶

Below is the assumed HT aspect ratio.

boom_plane[source]¶

Defines the XZ-plane that is coincident with the boom connector.

Returns:Boom XZ Plane
Return type:Plane
center_of_gravity[source]¶

Location of the center of gravity of the compound stabilizer w.r.t the origin. This is calculated with weighted averages.

Returns:Location Tuple in SI meter
Return type:Point
color¶

This value is used to set the default color of the wing-part

component_type[source]¶

This attribute names the component ‘ct’ for compound stabilizer.

Returns:Name of Compound Tail Configuration
Return type:str
configuration¶

Below is a switch to determine the configuration.

connector_left[source]¶

This rotates the extruded left boom shaft connector to point in the X direction.

Returns:Left Boom Connector
Return type:MirroredShape
connector_right[source]¶

This rotates the extruded right boom shaft connector to point in the X direction.

Returns:Right Boom Connector
Return type:RotatedShape
critical_thickness[source]¶

This attribute finds the larger airfoil thickness of the HT or VT stabilizers to then be able to construct the tail-boom shaft with a radius equal to this larger thickness.

Returns:The larger airfoil thickness of the HT or VT
Return type:float
external_shape[source]¶

This defines the external shape for the ExternalBody class in definitions.

Returns:CompoundStabilizer External Geometry
Return type:ScaledShape
internal_shape[source]¶

This is the internal shape of the compound stabilizer. It is None because the current app uses a boom tail structure instead of a single fuselage.

Returns:VTP fuselage section bounding box
Return type:NoneType
lhc¶

Below is the non-dimensionalized horizontal tail arm

required_planform_area¶

Below is the required horizontal tail area of the main wings from the stability analysis.

stabilizer_h[source]¶

This is an instantiation of the HorizontalStabilizer class with the required planform area from the scissor plot.

Returns:Horizontal Tail Object
Return type:Fused
stabilizer_vleft[source]¶

This is an instantiation of the VerticalStablilizer class with the current aircraft dimensions for the left VT.

Returns:Left Vertical Tail Object
Return type:Fused
stabilizer_vright[source]¶

This is an instantiation of the VerticalStablilizer class with the current aircraft dimensions for the right VT.

Returns:Right Vertical Tail Object
Return type:Fused
tail_joiner[source]¶

This joins the tails and connector shafts together through a series of Fuse operations to be able to present a single external_shape required for the .step file output.

Returns:ParaPy Fused Boxes
Return type:Fused
tail_shaft_circle[source]¶

This attribute makes a circle with thickness found from ‘critical_thickness’ attribute and extrudes it along the HT tip chord.

Returns:Boom Connector Cross-Section and Extrude
taper¶

Below is the assumed VT taper ratio.

twist¶

This is the wing twist for the VT.

weight[source]¶

Total mass of the compound tail.

Returns:Mass in SI kilogram
Return type:float
wing_mac_length¶

Below is the MAC length of the wing

wing_planform_area¶

Below is the required TOTAL wing area of the main wings.

wing_semi_span¶

Below is the semispan of the wing
